actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the screening and counseling of Americans with respect to Tay-Sachs disease.
short_title: National Tay-Sachs Disease Screening and Counseling Act

summary.text: National Tay-Sachs Disease Screening and Counseling Act - Provides that it is the purpose of this Act to establish a national program, under the Public Health Service Act, for voluntary Tay-Sachs disease screening and counseling. Authorizes appropriations of $2,500,000 for fiscal year 1976 for making grants to public and nonprofit entities to establish and operate such screening programs. Sets forth the procedure for applications for and administration of such grants.

titles.title: National Tay-Sachs Disease Screening and Counseling Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the screening and counseling of Americans with respect to Tay-Sachs disease.
